document_data.title: Underdeveloped Real Estate - Tower Aqueduct
document_data.author: [[James P. Buchanan]]
document_data.mainbody: '''"Underdeveloped Real Estate - Tower Aqueduct"''' is a short adventure set near [[Ravens Bluff]] for [[Dungeons & Dragons]] 2{{nd}} edition published in [[Polyhedron 93|''Polyhedron'' #93]].{{TOC limit|2}}
